item.title: Trying Out FlexDashboard
item.description: Thanks to Dr. Elaine McVey’s course at DataCamp, I feel that I can convert my Data Science course’s lab assignments and slides to flexdashboard. Today, I converted the first lab assignment. The hope is that the students can clearly see the instructions that I am trying to convey rather than facing a wall of text. To convert my lab, which was previously in an R Markdown document for HTML output, I had to
